actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, GSA, Justice, GAO.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit the disposal of surplus property to States and local governments for correctional facility use.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize the Administrator of General Services to sell or lease to State and local governments surplus property that the Attorney General recommends to be suitable and necessary for correctional facility use.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit the disposal of surplus property to States and local governments for correctional facility use.
